# @withstudiocms/config-utils

## 0.1.0-beta.3

### Patch Changes

- [#685](https://github.com/withstudiocms/studiocms/pull/685) [`169c9be`](https://github.com/withstudiocms/studiocms/commit/169c9be7649bbd9522c6ab68a9aeca4ebfc2b86d) Thanks [@Adammatthiesen](https://github.com/Adammatthiesen)! - Add tests to ensure functionality of main utils

## 0.1.0-beta.2

### Patch Changes

- [#666](https://github.com/withstudiocms/studiocms/pull/666) [`0b1574b`](https://github.com/withstudiocms/studiocms/commit/0b1574bfe32ef98dc62ed9082a132a540f0ad4ba) Thanks [@Adammatthiesen](https://github.com/Adammatthiesen)! - Tweak watch config utility to be a builder akin to the configresolver util

## 0.1.0-beta.1

### Patch Changes

- [#657](https://github.com/withstudiocms/studiocms/pull/657) [`a05bb16`](https://github.com/withstudiocms/studiocms/commit/a05bb16d3dd0d1a429558b4dce316ad7fb80b049) Thanks [@Adammatthiesen](https://github.com/Adammatthiesen)! - Migrate to using new config utils package that contains generic config helpers instead of relying on specific ones built-in to studiocms

## 0.1.0-beta.1

### Patch Changes

- [#657](https://github.com/withstudiocms/studiocms/pull/657) [`a05bb16`](https://github.com/withstudiocms/studiocms/commit/a05bb16d3dd0d1a429558b4dce316ad7fb80b049) Thanks [@Adammatthiesen](https://github.com/Adammatthiesen)! - Migrate to using new config utils package that contains generic config helpers instead of relying on specific ones built-in to studiocms

children.name: calls fetch with correct arguments and shows success toast on login
Password Utility - verifyPasswordLength - should return "undefined" for input "123456"
SMTPService - Should initialize with proxy config
Password Utility - constantTimeEqual - should return false for inputs "abc" and "def"
SMTPService - Should initialize with valid config
pathGenerator('', 'https://example.com') should create correct path builder
readJson - reads and parses JSON file content
Post - should reject post data with invalid format
convertToSafeString - returns empty string for input with only underscores
getUrlParam should throw AstroError for malformed URL
Password Utility - buildSecurePassword returns correct format
studiocms:config:setup Hook - Configures Auth0 OAuth Provider
pageContentComponentFilter - throws error if comp is empty string
readJson - throws SyntaxError if file content is invalid JSON
Category - should validate complete category data
RenderedData should validate rendered data structure
SMTPService - SMTPTransportConfig Should Create Live Layer
closeOnOutsideClick - should not dispatch toggle-app event when clicking inside astro-dev-toolbar or additionalCheck returns true
should have correct type and default for favicon
loadChangelog - throws on unknown semver category
createWindowElement should create window element with correct properties
Deepmerge - Effect Service - throws an error if the service merge function throws
closeOnOutsideClock - should dispatch toggle-app event on outside click
StudioCMSError should create an error with the correct properties
Tag - should validate complete tag data
Password Utility - breakSecurePassword throws error for input "badformat"
Password Utility - constantTimeEqual - should return false for inputs "abc" and "abcd"
Plugin Creation - Validates Plugin Structure and Options
convertToSafeString - trims leading and trailing underscores
pathGenerator('/api/', 'https://example.com/') should create correct path builder
CheckIfUnsafe.password - should return false for password "uniquepassword123"
convertToSafeString - returns empty string for empty input
convertToSafeString - returns empty string for input with only special characters
SMTPService - Verify Transport with Invalid Config
pathGenerator('/api', 'https://example.com') should create correct path builder
isFaviconExt should return false for invalid extension
isFaviconExt should return true for valid extension
Deepmerge - Effect Service - merges two simple objects
convertToSafeString - replaces non-alphanumeric with underscores and lowercases
Deepmerge - throws an error if the merge function throws

parameters: Password must be between 6 and 255 characters long.
